metadata.name: Memento
metadata.description:
A cloud-based HUD for The Binding of Isaac Game to: - Track your skill progress over time - Share your best runs with your friends - Help the community explore the complexity and randomness of the game
As web-scaling is more of a witchcraft than an exact science, it is currently on a CLOSED/INVITE-ONLY BETA status.
More info: https://about.memento.ma/guide/register
